title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.3 - Exit passageway
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-1.3 - Exit passageway

State Regulations
(a) An
unobstructed exit or passageway from an elevator to the outside of the building
shall be provided at the lowest point of an elevator's travel. (b) Passageway under car. No elevator car
installed after April 15, 1915 shall be permitted to descend into a passageway. (See also §
8-1.26.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
